ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 635
ygData.msgSnippet: Kalera... You sound familiar. Didn t you die a gruesome death with me and Rymth in the assasain room? I had no idea it was you, Miriana. (Was it? I remember a
ygData.messageBody:
Kalera... You sound familiar. Didn't you die a
gruesome death with me and Rymth in the assasain room?
I had no idea it was you, Miriana. (Was it? I remember
a lass in almost full lambent, with a rubi bp and a
guise. And the LoD tag. And the level was about
right...) Shoulda said something, Kambei speaks highly
of you. (Prolly just talks about how obnoxious I am.)



Double Entendre

-------------------------------------------------------
From: Miriana <miriana@...>
Subject: Harmonic's Distorted view of Dragon Raids
(and some P.S.'s for
Sylly)

Sorry, I couldn't resist the pun on your last name
Harmonic :P.

Harmonic, having never been on a succesful Dragon raid
on Innoruuk I'm
surprised to see your... confidence by which say these
things.

<snip>


P.P.P.S. The only reason we put pressure on ML and
Storm to yield to us
was because one of our members was bound on the
pedestal where Vox sits
from a previous Vox killing and gated back without
remembering to
rebind.
Hence, getting him back was a high priority of ours.

Miriana
Level 50 Cleric
Kalera
Level 35 Bard
Legions of Darkness
Innoruuk Server
